name: Horseradish Cream With Dried Cherries
recipeIngredient: 3 tablespoons grated fresh horseradish or more to taste
Salt and freshly ground white pepper to taste

recipeInstructions.text: Place the cherries in a small bowl, cover with very warm water and let soak until softened. Drain on paper towels and set aside to dry.

With a whisk or electric hand mixer, beat the cream until thick but not stiff. Blend in a dash of vinegar. Stir in the cherries and horseradish and salt and pepper to taste. Serve with roasted meats or with fresh vegetables.
